Articles.Content:
I'll throw it in the trash, as I have no idea what Sealand is.

I give $1.00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 to the next person.

Googolplex \*currency\* to the next user

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-08T02:08:34Z" title="11/08/2015 02:08  AM" data-short="8 yr">November 8, 2015</time> by EuSouONumero345**

I only gave you $1, but with a of zeroes after the decimal (troll).

I will make my own space program and genetically engineer kerbals to make KSP IRL!

I give 500 yen to the next user.

I'll buy sushi. Yummy.

50 pounds to the next user.

I guess I'll buy some kerosene.

I give 13 pesos to the next user.

I buy the smaller i-beam.

I give 39000 Roots (Kerbal currency) to the next person.

(Also in my last post I forgot to give money to the next person).

I build a failed Mun rocket.

I give the next person 100 dank memes.

Makes a dank meme video a la Markiplier.

The next person gets a solar system.

I throw a black hole at it

The next person gets a universe.

I'll go and live in it.

I'm feeling very generous today, so i'll donate an old used sock to the user below me :-D

Ah man, I didn't get any dank memes ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I could really use a sock right now.

I give 1,000,000 pesos to the next user.

I convert it into Ã‚Â£39534.48 and donate Ã‚Â£1000 of it to a charity.

The next user gets Ã‚Â£500.

Er, what does a Canadian in Canada do with Euros? Donate it to DankMeme foundation for children's hospital.(Not actually a thing)

I give the next user...

$123456789987654321123456788765432234567765433456654455 CAD.

I give it back. (BTW those were British pounds.)

The next user gets Ã‚Â¥56793

That's like $50, so I'll buy some Dank Memes.

I give 50 cents to the next user.

Ty, I give a homeless person some coffee.

I give $6734892CAD

I buy Canada eh.

The next user gets a free Twilight Zone universe.
I give away my free universe to everyone.

I blow it up.

I give a KS25 (Vector engine) to the next user.

I strap on an External Command Seat, turn on infinite fuel, and go to Dres.

I give Dres to the next user.

OMIGOSH!

I give Eeloo and Moho to someone.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Please donate them to Dres.

I smash them together and throw them at Dres, Dres gets smashed.

I give planetary rubble to the next person.

I put all the pieces together and make Dres.

I give the next user a Mini-Dres.

I put it in synchronous orbit around Dres.

I give a cup of tea to the next user.

I dump the tea on Dres.

I give the tea-soaked Dres to the next poster.
